display_long_description:
## Plank and Kitty

Gran’s cat has wandered off and ended up at the end of a plank high above the city!

Step through the doorway into a virtual cartoon world, walk the plank, rescue the kitty, and bring it safely back to gran.

**Plank and Kitty is a mixed-reality experience, not a game.**  
It’s designed to be fun, approachable, and best enjoyed with friends or family taking turns.  
Everyone can join in by watching the action on TV or mobile.

---

## What makes it different

- **Two-way mixed-reality portal**  
  A door in your room opens into a virtual world — and from the plank, the door becomes a portal back into your real room.

- **Exciting but not extreme**  
  High enough to feel thrilling, without pushing into fear-only territory. Accessible fun for everybody.

- **Configurable play space**  
  Preview and adjust the size and position to fit your room before you start.

- **Perfect for group play**  
  Take turns, watch reactions, and enjoy it together.

- **TV casting support**  
  Cast to a TV so everyone can see what the player sees.

---

## Device Support
Supports mixed reality on Quest 2, Quest 3, and Quest Pro.  
Passthrough quality varies by device.

---

## Comfort Note
This experience involves real-world movement.  
This is a **room-scale mixed reality experience** and adapts to your available space.  
Make sure your area is clear before playing.
